name: Bullet Style
description:
Your gun only has one bullet; make the perfect ricochet shot and shatter every target in one stylish move. It's like you're not even trying, that's how effortlessly rad you are. The only thing standing between you and an even Cooler You is the fact that you haven't played this game yet.

This is a submission for the 48 hour GMTK Game Jam, so it's a bit rough around the edges. There are 10 levels right now. If you like the concept and would enjoy seeing it polished into a snappier, snazzier, more complete game, let me know in the comments!

All audio, images, and assets were created by me, except for the glass-shattering audio which was an open source sound effect.
